item.title: A leaf off Feminism
item.description: I know, it is uncanny for a male to give any take on Feminism.

item.title: From Tulips to Dogecoin
item.description: If liberty means anything at all, it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.

item.title: Factfulness
item.description: Factfulness, by Hans Rosling So this year, I took a bold New Year Resolution: “50 Books a Year”.

item.title: Eudaimonia
item.description: Humans appeared on earth around 200,000 years ago but most human advancements are from the last 500 years.
